Text: Just downloaded the nfo file and it says this film is The.Amityville.Horror.2005.DVDrip.XviD-DVL probably a fake unless someone wants to risk d/loading and prove me wrong.

When it comes to recent releases that everyone wants, the wisest policy is to wait until a trusted uploader posts it. The time-lag between a legit copy being released in the wild and a known uploader posting it on TPB is negligible. This one looks like bullshit to me.
